original_title: Σάμουελ Μοντιάνο: Η Αποστολή. Από τη Ρόδο στο Άουσβιτς
overview: Documenting the testimony of one of the last surviving Rhodeslis (Rhodian Jews), Sami Modiano, a survivor of Auschwitz-Birkenau, this film assumes the tasks of defending historical memory, humanity and dignity.
title: Samuel Modiano, The Mission: From Rhodes To Auschwitz
